name: Keycap
description: Keycap is a React-based e-commerce platform for gadget enthusiasts.The project emphasizes reusability through the implementation of the React Context API. The website caters to both user and admin functionalities, ensuring a seamless experience for all stakeholders.

Features.User-Centric Design: Prioritized an intuitive user interface, allowing users to effortlessly browse, add products to the cart, and customize order quantities.
Features.Order Tracking: Users can track their orders in real-time, providing transparency and peace of mind.
Features.Admin Functionality: Admins enjoy a comprehensive suite of tools, including order management, product addition, and user management.
Features.Reusable Components: Employed React Context API to create reusable components, optimizing code efficiency and maintainability.

Technology Stack.Styling: Tailwind for a clean and responsive design.
Technology Stack.Backend: Node and Express for robust server-side functionality.
Technology Stack.Database: MongoDB for efficient data storage and retrieval.
Technology Stack.Payment Integration: Integrated Stripe for secure and hassle-free transactions.
Technology Stack.Authentication: Implemented JWT and Firebase authentication, ensuring a secure and user-friendly experience

name: myScheduler
description: 'My Scheduler' is an innovative online event scheduler that simplifies the process of creating and managing events, with a special emphasis on seamless integration with Google Meet for virtual meetings. As the Front End Developer on this project, I undertook key responsibilities that spanned both design and functionality.

name: Daily-Buy-E-Commerce
description: During my internship at Nur Software, I undertook a pivotal role as a front-end developer for the 'Daily-Buy-E-Commerce' project. The project involved transforming a meticulously designed Figma prototype into a responsive and dynamic React application, catering to seamless user experiences across various devices.
